title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the biggest problem facing the NBA right now and it centers around Kevin Durant. He pushes back against the criticism that "mega conferences" is ruining competitive balance in college football. He also explains why it's looking like Kyrie Irving might be forced to return to the Brooklyn Nets. Plus, Fox Sports college football reporter Bruce Feldman joins the show in studio to give insight into concerns the top college football coaches have about conference realignment. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
